name: Garden Combat
description:
• Join Broc the Broccoli in his epic quest to kill Corn, a notorious father-murderer!
  • Experience the minimal storytelling necessary to battle by planting veggies versus your arch-nemesis!
  • Plant over 4 (exactly 5) different plants, each with their own abilities and stats!

Can you get more points than your opponent? Or will you be (presumably) murdered and your son have to take up double duty revengening two deceased ancestors?
